LightningComponentBundle.description: Related list that allows you to specify WHERE condition

property.name: childObjectName
property.label: Child Object
property.description: API name of an object that will be shown in related list

property.name: parentFieldName
property.label: Parent Field
property.description: API name of lookup or M-D relationship field to parent. Eg.: AccountId, CustomAccount__c

property.name: columns
property.label: Columns
property.description: Columns to be displayed. Comma-separated API names

property.name: condition
property.label: Condition
property.description: SOQL condition (without WHERE word). Eg.: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'My_Type'

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon
property.description: Icon to be displayed next to title. Eg.: standard:contact
